rules_text:
Exile up to one target activated ability, triggered ability, or nonland permanent.
Coalesce {5}{G}{W}{U} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {5}{G}{W}{U}. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
End of All Things enters tapped.
